om
Class AbstractDatabaseSpecificOpenMarkServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          om.AbstractOpenMarkServlet
              om.AbstractDatabaseSpecificOpenMarkServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministrationServlet
public abstract class AbstractDatabaseSpecificOpenMarkServlet
extends AbstractOpenMarkServlet

Servlets (webapps) that require access to the OpenMark database should extend this implementation as it provides everything setup for the RequestAssociates and tidies itself on shutdown.

Author:
Trevor Hinson
See Also:
